column1: Table 25. Victimization rates by type of crime and number of units in structure occupied by household
data source: National Criminal Victimization Survey, 2005  NCJ 215244
authors:  Patsy Klaus and Cathy Maston
Table 25. Property crimes, 2005:  Victimization rates by type of crime and number of units in structure occupied by household
Note: Detail may not add to total shown because of rounding.
Excludes data on households for which the number of units in the structure was not ascertained.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Includes data on mobile homes, not shown separately.
